Address.label: Address
Address.value: NO. 1088 YUANSHEN ROAD,28TH FLOOR, PUDONG NEW DISTRICT, SHANGHAI, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Lufax Holding Ltd is a technology-empowered personal financial services platform in China. The company address the large unmet demand for personal lending among small business owners as well as salaried workers in China and provides tailor-made wealth management solutions to China's middle class and affluent population. Its platform has two hubs namely Retail Credit Facilitation Hub and Wealth Management Hub.
